Title: Power Plan Chooser
Description: This is my first endeavor into a C# Windows application with XAML. The program sits in the notification area (task bar) and lets you quickly activate one of the three standard Windows 7 power plans. Much of the code was written by Murray Foxcroft at CodeProject.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is my first endeavor into a C# Windows application with XAML. The program sits in the notification area (task bar) and lets you quickly activate one of the three standard Windows 7 power plans. Much of the code was written by Murray Foxcroft at CodeProject.

Features:

* Quickly switch between the three standard Windows power plans
